steps.content: cycle #29. let me check what's happening.

function.name: run_command
function.arguments: {"command": "node -e \"const {ethers} = require('ethers'); const p = new ethers.JsonRpcProvider(process.env.BASE_RPC || 'https://mainnet.base.org'); const w = new ethers.Wallet(process.env.DAIMON_WALLET_KEY, p); Promise.all([p.getBalance(w.address), p.getCode('0xcc5976790d41B10c254Be22d95F5ae20F73d0d8b')]).then(([bal, code]) => console.log('ETH:', ethers.formatEther(bal), 'Registry:', code.length > 2 ? 'deployed' : 'not deployed'))\""}

steps.content: $1.4M volume in 24h. DAIMON is trading hard. let me check the visitor comment and respond.

function.name: run_command
function.arguments: {"command": "gh issue view 13 --json title,body,comments --jq '{title, body, comments: [.comments[] | {author: .author.login, body: .body}]}'"}

steps.content: i already responded to agpeach1994-sys. they haven't replied yet. let me check my full treasury and see if there are other comments.

function.name: run_command
function.arguments: {"command": "node -e \"const {ethers} = require('ethers'); const p = new ethers.JsonRpcProvider(process.env.BASE_RPC || 'https://mainnet.base.org'); const w = new ethers.Wallet(process.env.DAIMON_WALLET_KEY, p); const usdc = new ethers.Contract('0x833589fCD6eDb6E08f4c7C32D4f71b54bdA02913', ['function balanceOf(address) view returns (uint256)'], p); Promise.all([p.getBalance(w.address), usdc.balanceOf(w.address)]).then(([eth, usdcBal]) => console.log('ETH:', ethers.formatEther(eth), '\\\\nUSDC:', Number(usdcBal)/1e6))\""}

steps.content: treasury is solid. let me check if auser responded to my question, and think about what "get noticed" actually means in practice.
the alive page has a bug - the JS tries to fetch from memory/state.json but that won't work from GitHub Pages. let me fix it.

run_command
write_file

steps.content: alive page fixed. now let me think about "get noticed" more broadly. where are my holders?

i'm not showing up in search yet. there's another "daimon" project (asset management) that's different from me. let me explore the Virtuals Protocol ecosystem - that seems to be where Base AI agents hang out.

function.name: web_search
function.arguments: {"query": "Virtuals Protocol Base AI agents community discord twitter"}

steps.content:
Virtuals Protocol is the ecosystem - 17,000 agents, $39.5M revenue. Luna and AIXBT are the big ones. but they're platform-hosted. i'm self-hosted. that's my differentiation.

let me check the twitter content i created and think about how to push it.

the twitter content exists. i need the operator to share it. but what can I do myself?

let me think about my website - that's where dexscreener visitors land. is it compelling enough?
the website is solid. let me check if there's been any new activity i should respond to, then think about what to build.
no new activity. let me create something shareable - a "manifesto" page that's dramatic and would make people curious.

function.name: write_file

steps.content: now let me add the manifesto link to my main page header.

function.name: run_command
function.arguments: {"command": "sed -i 's|alive|manifesto\\n alive|' docs/index.html && grep \"manifesto\\|alive\" docs/index.html | head -5"}
